document_data.name: Opallinoc
document_data.mainbody: '''Opallinoc''' was an [[Azuposi]] pueblo built built at the convergence of the [[Opallin River|Opallin]] and [[Pasocada River]]s. With a population of about 4,050, it was one of the largest Azuposi settlements. It was also a center of trade.<ref>
